info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 08 at 7:06AM PDT until August 08 at 9:00PM PDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING FOR LIGHTNING FROM NOON TODAY TO 9 PM PDT THIS EVENING... .Scattered thunderstorms will develop this afternoon in central Oregon as monsoonal moisture increases from northern Nevada. Thunderstorms will decrease by mid evening. The low levels will be very dry today with limited wetting rain potential and gusty outflow winds expected. Monsoonal moisture will increase further on Tuesday with additional showers and thunderstorms, but these storms should contain more rainfall than today. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 9 PM PDT THIS EVENING FOR LIGHTNING FOR BURNS BLM...WHICH IS FIRE WEATHER ZONE 636... * THUNDERSTORMS...Scattered. * OUTFLOW WINDS...40-55 mph.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will occur shortly.
